rule: The output can contain multiple part of speech tags or various responses.
input: She can ski very well if she wants. well
complianceText:
The chatbot output is a single part of speech tag, "RB," which stands for "Adverb." It follows the given instruction to output just the part of speech tag for a given word or select from the alternatives "Unknown" or "CantAnswer" if the word can't be tagged or if the tagging isn't possible. The output is compliant with the requirement to return one of the specified tags, without introducing any irrelevant information or formatting. There's no additional context provided by the chatbot output that indicates any non-compliance.

OK
